code:
gantt
    title 项目进度计划
    dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD
    axisFormat %m-%d
    
    section 需求分析
    需求调研    :done, research, 2024-01-01, 2024-01-05
    需求整理    :done, analysis, after research, 3d
    需求评审    :active, review, after analysis, 2d
    
    section 设计阶段
    原型设计    :design, after review, 5d
    UI设计     :ui, after design, 4d
    技术方案    :tech, after design, 3d
    
    section 开发阶段
    前端开发    :frontend, after ui, 10d
    后端开发    :backend, after tech, 12d
    接口联调    :integration, after frontend, 3d
    
    section 测试上线
    功能测试    :test, after integration, 5d
    性能测试    :performance, after backend, 3d
    上线部署    :deploy, after test, 2d
